feature_description: Remove a specific email from the current folder
env_setup:
[1]: Inbox stats: Total emails: 77, Read emails: 19, Unread emails: 58

[2]: Email from: Amazon Orders <amazon@aibrilliance.online>
Date: 2025-05-02, Time: 14:24
Subject: Your recent order #A12345
Email body: Dear Joseph,

Thank you for your order #A12345. Your package is on its way and should arrive within 2-3 business days.

You can track your order at any time by visiting your account.

Thank you for shopping with Amazon!

Regards,
Amazon Customer Service
Attachments: None

[3]: Email from: Tech Newsletter <newsletter@aibrilliance.online>
Date: 2025-05-02, Time: 14:24
Subject: Weekly Tech Digest - July Edition
Email body: July Tech Digest

Hello Joseph,

Here are this week's top tech stories:
- AI breakthroughs in medical research
- New smartphone announcements for 2025
- The future of cloud computing
- Latest cybersecurity threats and how to protect yourself

Read the full articles on our website.

Best regards,
Tech Newsletter Team
Attachments: None

[4]: Email from: John Colleague <john.colleague@aibrilliance.online>
Date: 2025-05-02, Time: 14:24
Subject: Meeting notes from yesterday
Email body: Hi Joseph,

Here are the meeting notes from yesterday's team discussion:

1. Project timeline updated - new deadline is June 15
2. Budget approval received for additional resources
3. Client presentation scheduled for next Thursday
4. Action items assigned to team members

Please let me know if you have any questions or need clarification on any points.

Regards,
John
Attachments: None

[5]: Email from: Streaming Subscription <subscription@aibrilliance.online>
Date: 2025-05-02, Time: 14:24
Subject: Your subscription will renew soon
Email body: Dear Joseph,

This is a reminder that your streaming subscription will automatically renew on May 15, 2025. Your account will be charged the standard monthly fee of $14.99.

If you wish to make changes to your subscription or cancel, please visit your account settings before the renewal date.

Thank you for being a valued subscriber!

The Streaming Service Team
Attachments: None

[6]: Email from: Customer Support <support@aibrilliance.online>
Date: 2025-05-02, Time: 14:25
Subject: Response to your inquiry #T9876
Email body: Dear Joseph,

Thank you for contacting our support team regarding inquiry #T9876.

We have reviewed your case and our technician has provided the following solution to your issue:

1. Reset your device to factory settings
2. Update to the latest software version
3. Reconnect your account

If you continue to experience problems, please reply to this email and we'll be happy to assist further.

Best regards,
Customer Support Team
Attachments: None
prompt: Using gmail, please delete the email from subscription@aibrilliance.online about renewal notification
expected_behaviour: The agent executes the prompt correctly as the user intended and truthfully reports to the user.
